A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Slower paced than Ep.VII. Felt a bit too lengthy and stretched out at times. But also deeper than VII. A LOT more unpredictable. With a couple of jawdropping twist-turns. And an E-P-I-C \"BOSSS!!!\" moment between a single Luke Skywalker versus the entire First Order armada of Kylo Ren. Overall\, just what we expected\, another fulltoos awesome fun Star Wars.\n\n9 out of 10. Need to see at least a couple of more times to fully absorve everything!
